translated: You should rely on and cultivate the good dharmas of nirvana, and attain the complete precepts, the eight pārājikas, the nineteen saṃghāvaśeṣas, the thirty niḥsargikapātayantas, the one hundred and forty-one pātayantas, the eight pratideśanīyas, the dharmas of the assembly, and the seven methods for resolving disputes in accordance with the Dharma.

original: 我今略說教誡汝，後和上、阿闍梨當廣教汝。
analyzed: 我今略說教誡汝，後和上、阿闍梨當廣教汝。
translated: I now briefly explain the precepts to you, and later your preceptor and teacher will extensively teach you.

original: 」受具足已，即日和上尼應將到比丘僧所，和上尼應為乞，䠒跪合掌作如是言：
analyzed: 」受具足已，即日和上尼應將到比丘僧所，和上尼應為乞，䠒跪合掌作如是言：
translated: After receiving the full ordination, on that very day the preceptor nun should take her to the bhikṣu saṅgha. The preceptor nun should request on her behalf, kneeling with palms joined, saying:
Venerable Saṅgha, please be mindful!

original: 我已與某甲受具足，今從僧乞為某甲受具足，哀愍故與某甲受具足。
analyzed: 我已與某甲受具足，今從僧乞為某甲受具足，哀愍故與某甲受具足。
translated: I have already given the full ordination to so-and-so, and now I request on behalf of so-and-so to receive the full ordination from the Saṅgha. Out of compassion, please give the full ordination to so-and-so.
Say this three times.
The karma master should ask:
Is the bhikṣuṇī saṅgha pure and free from obstructions?
If you do not ask, you commit an offense of wrong conduct.
The karma master should say:
Venerable Sangha, listen!

original: 某甲從某甲尼受具足已，比丘尼眾中清淨無遮法，尼某甲已從僧乞受具足。
analyzed: 某甲從某甲尼受具足已，比丘尼眾中清淨無遮法，尼某甲已從僧乞受具足。
translated: So-and-so has already received full ordination from nun so-and-so, and in the community of nuns she is pure and free from obstructions. Nun so-and-so has already requested full ordination from the Sangha.

original: 若僧時到，僧某甲，和上尼某甲，欲從僧乞受具足。
analyzed: 若僧時到，僧某甲，和上尼某甲，欲從僧乞受具足。
translated: If the Sangha has arrived at the right time, the Sangha will grant so-and-so full ordination with nun so-and-so as her preceptor.

original: 諸大德聽某甲和上尼某甲，欲從僧乞受具足，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
analyzed: 諸大德聽某甲和上尼某甲，欲從僧乞受具足，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
translated: The venerable ones listen! So-and-so, with nun so-and-so as her preceptor, wishes to request full ordination from the Sangha. The Sangha approves and is silent, therefore this matter is thus settled.

original: 」羯磨師應教䠒跪合掌作如是言：
analyzed: 」羯磨師應教䠒跪合掌作如是言：
translated: The karma master should instruct her to kneel with palms joined and say:
Venerable Sangha, remember!

original: 我某甲從和上尼某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中清淨無遮法。
analyzed: 我某甲從和上尼某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中清淨無遮法。
translated: I, so-and-so, have received full ordination from preceptor nun so-and-so, and in the community of nuns I am pure and free from obstructions.

original: 我某甲，和上尼某甲，我今從僧乞受具足，唯願僧哀愍故，與我受具足。
analyzed: 我某甲，和上尼某甲，我今從僧乞受具足，唯願僧哀愍故，與我受具足。
translated: I, so-and-so, with Venerable Nun so-and-so as preceptor, now request the Sangha to grant me full ordination. May the Sangha out of compassion grant me full ordination.
Repeat this up to three times.
The karma master should say:
Venerable Sangha, listen!

original: 某甲從某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中清淨無遮法，已從僧乞受具足。
analyzed: 某甲從某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中清淨無遮法，已從僧乞受具足。
translated: So-and-so is receiving full ordination from so-and-so. She has been purified in the Bhikṣuṇī Saṃgha and has requested the Sangha for full ordination.

original: 若僧時到，僧某甲，和上尼某甲，我欲於僧中問遮法。
analyzed: 若僧時到，僧某甲，和上尼某甲，我欲於僧中問遮法。
translated: If the Sangha is ready, I will ask the Sangha on behalf of so-and-so, with Venerable Nun so-and-so as preceptor, about the prohibitive factors.
All venerable ones in the Sangha, listen!

original: 某甲，和上尼某甲，我欲於僧中問遮法，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
analyzed: 某甲，和上尼某甲，我欲於僧中問遮法，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
translated: So-and-so, with Venerable Nun so-and-so as preceptor, I will ask the Sangha about the prohibitive factors. If the Sangha agrees to remain silent, this matter will be considered settled.
The karma master should ask:

original: 「今是至誠時、是實語時，於諸天、世間、天、魔、梵、沙門、婆羅門、諸天、世人、阿修羅。
analyzed: 「今是至誠時、是實語時，於諸天、世間、天、魔、梵、沙門、婆羅門、諸天、世人、阿修羅。
translated: Now is the time for utmost sincerity, the time for true words. In the presence of all gods, humans, demons, Brahmā, śramaṇas, brāhmaṇas, gods, humans, and asuras in the world,

original: 若不實者，便於中欺誑，亦復於如來、應供、正遍知二部僧中欺誑，此是大罪。
analyzed: 若不實者，便於中欺誑，亦復於如來、應供、正遍知二部僧中欺誑，此是大罪。
translated: If it is not true, then you will deceive in this, and also deceive the Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One, and the two parts of the Saṅgha, which is a great offense.

original: 我今僧中當問汝，有者言有，無者言無。
analyzed: 我今僧中當問汝，有者言有，無者言無。
translated: I will now ask you in the Saṅgha. If you have, say you have. If you do not have, say you do not have.
Do your parents and husband permit it?

original: 」乃至除女人隱處，餘如上盡問。
analyzed: 」乃至除女人隱處，餘如上盡問。
translated: Up to excluding the private parts of a woman, the rest is asked in full as above.
The karma master should say like this:
Venerable Saṅgha, please listen!

original: 某甲從某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中問清淨無遮法，已從僧乞受具足，父母夫主已聽，已求和上，五衣鉢具，二歲學戒滿，已乞畜眾羯磨竟，自說清淨無遮法。
analyzed: 某甲從某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中問清淨無遮法，已從僧乞受具足，父母夫主已聽，已求和上，五衣鉢具，二歲學戒滿，已乞畜眾羯磨竟，自說清淨無遮法。
translated: So-and-so, having received the full ordination from so-and-so, has asked about the pure unobstructed dharmas in the bhikṣuṇī saṅgha, has requested the full ordination from the Saṅgha, has obtained permission from her parents and husband, has requested a preceptor, has the five robes and alms bowl, has completed the two-year study of the precepts, has requested the karman for permission to keep disciples, and has declared that she has no obstructing dharmas.

original: 若僧時到，僧某甲，和尚尼某甲，我欲於僧中說三依。
analyzed: 若僧時到，僧某甲，和尚尼某甲，我欲於僧中說三依。
translated: If it is the right time for the Saṅgha, the Saṅgha should listen. So-and-so, with the preceptor bhikṣuṇī so-and-so, I wish to speak the three refuges in the Saṅgha.

original: 」「諸大德聽某甲和上尼某甲，我欲於僧中說三依，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
analyzed: 」「諸大德聽某甲和上尼某甲，我欲於僧中說三依，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
translated: Venerable ones, listen! So-and-so, with teacher nun so-and-so, I wish to speak the three refuges in the Sangha. The Sangha listens silently, therefore it is like this.
Good woman, listen!

original: 此是如來、應供、正遍知欲饒益故，於聲聞尼眾中正說制三依。
analyzed: 此是如來、應供、正遍知欲饒益故，於聲聞尼眾中正說制三依。
translated: This is the Tathāgata, the Worthy One, the Perfectly Enlightened One, who wishes to benefit, therefore in the Sangha of nuns he correctly speaks and establishes the three refuges.

original: 若堪忍直心善女人與受具足，不堪忍者不與受具足。
analyzed: 若堪忍直心善女人與受具足，不堪忍者不與受具足。
translated: If one can endure, a sincere woman will be given full ordination, if one cannot endure, full ordination will not be given.

original: 糞掃衣，少事易得應淨無諸過，隨順比丘尼法，依是出家受具足，得作比丘尼。
analyzed: 糞掃衣，少事易得應淨無諸過，隨順比丘尼法，依是出家受具足，得作比丘尼。
translated: Rag robes, with few affairs, easy to obtain, pure, without faults, in accordance with the Dharma of nuns, relying on this to go forth and receive full ordination, one may become a nun.

original: 是中盡壽能堪忍持糞掃衣不？
analyzed: 是中盡壽能堪忍持糞掃衣不？
translated: Can you endure and uphold rag robes for the rest of your life?
She replies:
I can.

original: 」「若長得欽婆羅衣、㲲衣、芻摩衣、俱舍耶衣、舍那衣、麻衣、驅牟提衣。
analyzed: 」「若長得欽婆羅衣、㲲衣、芻摩衣、俱舍耶衣、舍那衣、麻衣、驅牟提衣。
translated: If you obtain long, fine linen, cotton, silk, wool, hemp, or ramie robes,

original: 」如是依乞食，依陳棄藥，如上廣說。
analyzed: 」如是依乞食，依陳棄藥，如上廣說。
translated: In this way, relying on begging for food, relying on discarded medicine, as explained in detail above.
Venerable Sangha, please listen!

original: 某甲從某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中清淨無遮法，已從僧乞受具足，父母夫主已聽，已求和上，五衣鉢具，二歲學戒滿，已作乞畜眾羯磨竟，自說清淨無遮法，已堪忍三依。
analyzed: 某甲從某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中清淨無遮法，已從僧乞受具足，父母夫主已聽，已求和上，五衣鉢具，二歲學戒滿，已作乞畜眾羯磨竟，自說清淨無遮法，已堪忍三依。
translated: So-and-so, having received the full ordination from so-and-so, has been purified and free from obstructions in the community of nuns, has requested the Sangha for the full ordination, has obtained permission from her parents and husband, has sought a preceptor, has the five robes and alms bowl, has completed the two-year study of the precepts, has made the request for the karman to accept disciples, has declared herself to be pure and free from obstructions, and is able to endure the three objects of refuge.

original: 若僧時到，僧與某甲受具足，和上尼某甲。
analyzed: 若僧時到，僧與某甲受具足，和上尼某甲。
translated: If the Sangha's time is right, the Sangha will grant the full ordination to so-and-so, with the preceptor nun so-and-so.
The announcement is made like this.
Venerable Sangha, please listen!

original: 某甲從某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中清淨無遮法，已從僧乞受具足，父母夫主已聽，已求和上，五衣鉢具，二歲學戒滿，已作乞畜眾羯磨竟，自說清淨無遮法，已堪忍三依。
analyzed: 某甲從某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中清淨無遮法，已從僧乞受具足，父母夫主已聽，已求和上，五衣鉢具，二歲學戒滿，已作乞畜眾羯磨竟，自說清淨無遮法，已堪忍三依。
translated: So-and-so has received full ordination from so-and-so, is pure in the bhikṣuṇī saṃgha, has requested full ordination from the saṃgha, has been approved by her parents and husband, has sought a preceptor, has the five robes and alms bowl, has completed the two-year study of the precepts, has made the request for the karman to accept disciples, has declared her purity and freedom from obstacles, and is able to endure the three supports.

original: 僧今與某甲受具足，和上尼某甲。
analyzed: 僧今與某甲受具足，和上尼某甲。
translated: The saṃgha now grants full ordination to so-and-so, with bhikṣuṇī so-and-so as preceptor.

original: 諸大德忍與某甲受具足，和上尼某甲，忍者默然，若不忍便說。
analyzed: 諸大德忍與某甲受具足，和上尼某甲，忍者默然，若不忍便說。
translated: Venerable ones, if you approve of granting full ordination to so-and-so, with bhikṣuṇī so-and-so as preceptor, please remain silent. If you do not approve, then speak.
This is the first karman.
The second and third are also said in the same way.

original: 「僧與某甲受具足竟，和上尼某甲，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
analyzed: 「僧與某甲受具足竟，和上尼某甲，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
translated: The saṃgha has completed granting full ordination to so-and-so, with bhikṣuṇī so-and-so as preceptor. Since the saṃgha has remained silent, this matter is thus upheld.
Good women, listen!

original: 汝已受具足，善受具足，一白三羯磨、無遮法、和合僧、二部眾、十眾已上。
analyzed: 汝已受具足，善受具足，一白三羯磨、無遮法、和合僧、二部眾、十眾已上。
translated: You have already received the full ordination, and have received it well, with one announcement and three proclamations, without obstructing factors, with a harmonious Saṅgha, with both parts of the assembly, and with ten or more members.

original: 汝今當敬重於佛、敬重於法、敬重於僧、敬重和上、敬重阿闍梨。
analyzed: 汝今當敬重於佛、敬重於法、敬重於僧、敬重和上、敬重阿闍梨。
translated: Now you should respect the Buddha, respect the Dharma, respect the Saṅgha, respect the preceptor, and respect the teacher.

original: 汝已遭遇，人身難得、佛世難值、聞法亦難、眾僧和合意願成就難。
analyzed: 汝已遭遇，人身難得、佛世難值、聞法亦難、眾僧和合意願成就難。
translated: You have already encountered what is difficult to obtain, a human body, a Buddha's world that is difficult to encounter, hearing the Dharma is also difficult, and the harmonious assembly's aspirations are difficult to accomplish.

original: 頂禮釋師子及諸聲聞眾，已得具足，如無憂華離於塵水，汝當依倚修習泥洹善法得具足。
analyzed: 頂禮釋師子及諸聲聞眾，已得具足，如無憂華離於塵水，汝當依倚修習泥洹善法得具足。
translated: Bowing to the Lion of the Śākyas and the assembly of śrāvakas, you have already attained fullness, like the worry-free flower free from dust and water. You should rely on and cultivate the good Dharma of nirvāṇa to attain fullness.

original: 」佛住毘舍離大林重閣精舍，爾時法豫比丘尼弟子欲受具足，時菴婆羅離車童子，聞法豫弟子欲受具足，便作是念：
analyzed: 」佛住毘舍離大林重閣精舍，爾時法豫比丘尼弟子欲受具足，時菴婆羅離車童子，聞法豫弟子欲受具足，便作是念：
translated: The Buddha was staying at the great forest multi-storied pavilion in Vaiśālī. At that time, the disciple of the bhikṣuṇī Dharmapāla wanted to receive the full ordination. When the young man of the Ambaṭṭha clan heard that Dharmapāla's disciple wanted to receive the full ordination, he thought like this:

original: 「此女於我有如是不饒益事，今若出精舍門者，我當更捉壞其梵行，令不得受具足。
analyzed: 「此女於我有如是不饒益事，今若出精舍門者，我當更捉壞其梵行，令不得受具足。
translated: This woman has done me such a disservice. If she leaves the nunnery now, I will catch her again and destroy her pure conduct, preventing her from receiving full ordination.

original: 」法預比丘尼聞已往到世尊所，頭面禮足却住一面，白佛言：
analyzed: 」法預比丘尼聞已往到世尊所，頭面禮足却住一面，白佛言：
translated: The nun Dharmadinnā heard this and went to where the World-Honored One was. She bowed her head to his feet, then stood to one side and said to the Buddha:
World-Honored One!

original: 我有弟子欲受具足，若出精舍者畏壞梵行，彼間住，此間僧得與遙受具足不？
analyzed: 我有弟子欲受具足，若出精舍者畏壞梵行，彼間住，此間僧得與遙受具足不？
translated: My disciple wishes to receive full ordination. If she leaves the nunnery, I fear it will destroy her pure conduct. If she stays there, can the monks here give her full ordination remotely?
The Buddha said:
You may!

original: 先比丘尼眾與受具足已，往比丘僧中乞使受具足。
analyzed: 先比丘尼眾與受具足已，往比丘僧中乞使受具足。
translated: After the nuns' community has given her full ordination, go to the monks' community and request them to give her full ordination.

original: 」尼僧與受具足已，法預即往白比丘僧乞使受具足。
analyzed: 」尼僧與受具足已，法預即往白比丘僧乞使受具足。
translated: After the nuns' community had given her full ordination, Dharmadinnā immediately went to inform the monks' community and request them to give her full ordination.
The karma master should say:
Venerable monks, please listen!

original: 法預比丘尼弟子某甲欲受具足，若來者畏傷梵行。
analyzed: 法預比丘尼弟子某甲欲受具足，若來者畏傷梵行。
translated: The disciple of Bhikṣuṇī Dharmaprema, named so-and-so, wishes to receive full ordination, but if she comes, she fears it will harm the pure conduct.

original: 若僧時到，僧法預比丘尼弟子某甲，欲從僧乞使受具足。
analyzed: 若僧時到，僧法預比丘尼弟子某甲，欲從僧乞使受具足。
translated: If the Saṅgha approves the time, the disciple of Bhikṣuṇī Dharmaprema, named so-and-so, wishes to request the Saṅgha to grant her the full ordination.

original: 諸大德僧聽法預比丘尼弟子某甲欲乞使受具足，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
analyzed: 諸大德僧聽法預比丘尼弟子某甲欲乞使受具足，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
translated: All elder members of the Saṅgha, please listen! The disciple of Bhikṣuṇī Dharmaprema, named so-and-so, wishes to request the full ordination. The Saṅgha approves and remains silent. I will thus keep this matter as it is.

original: 」和上尼應僧中䠒跪合掌作如是言：
analyzed: 」和上尼應僧中䠒跪合掌作如是言：
translated: The preceptor bhikṣuṇī should kneel in the Saṅgha and join palms in this way, saying:
Elder members of the Saṅgha, please be mindful!

original: 我法預比丘尼，弟子某甲欲受具足，若來者畏傷梵行，已比丘尼眾中受具足無遮法。
analyzed: 我法預比丘尼，弟子某甲欲受具足，若來者畏傷梵行，已比丘尼眾中受具足無遮法。
translated: My disciple, named so-and-so, wishes to receive full ordination, but if she comes, she fears it will harm the pure conduct. She has already received full ordination in the assembly of bhikṣuṇīs without any obstruction.

original: 我某甲為弟子某甲乞使受具足，唯願大德僧哀愍故，與我弟子某甲使受具足。
analyzed: 我某甲為弟子某甲乞使受具足，唯願大德僧哀愍故，與我弟子某甲使受具足。
translated: I, named so-and-so, request on behalf of my disciple, named so-and-so, to grant her the full ordination. I only pray that the elder members of the Saṅgha, out of compassion, will grant my disciple, named so-and-so, the full ordination.
In this way, up to three times.

original: 僧中應羯磨堪能者，若二、若三不得羯磨眾。
analyzed: 僧中應羯磨堪能者，若二、若三不得羯磨眾。
translated: In the Sangha, those who are capable should be appointed by karman. Two or three should not be appointed by the assembly.
The karman person should say like this:
Venerable Sangha, listen!

original: 法預比丘尼弟子某甲欲受具足，已比丘尼眾中受具足無遮法，若來者畏傷梵行。
analyzed: 法預比丘尼弟子某甲欲受具足，已比丘尼眾中受具足無遮法，若來者畏傷梵行。
translated: The disciple of the bhikṣuṇī Dharmapālā, named so-and-so, wishes to receive full ordination. She has already received full ordination in the bhikṣuṇī saṅgha without any obstacles. If she comes, she fears it will harm her pure conduct.

original: 法預比丘尼為弟子某甲，已從僧乞使受具足。
analyzed: 法預比丘尼為弟子某甲，已從僧乞使受具足。
translated: The bhikṣuṇī Dharmapālā, for the disciple named so-and-so, has already requested the saṅgha to send her to receive full ordination.

original: 若僧時到，僧今羯磨，某甲、某甲比丘為法預弟子某甲受具足。
analyzed: 若僧時到，僧今羯磨，某甲、某甲比丘為法預弟子某甲受具足。
translated: If the time has come for the saṅgha, the saṅgha should now perform the karman. So-and-so and so-and-so bhikṣus will give full ordination to the disciple of Dharmapālā named so-and-so.
The announcement is like this.
Venerable Saṅgha, listen!

original: 法預比丘尼為弟子某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中受具足無遮法，若來者畏傷梵行。
analyzed: 法預比丘尼為弟子某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中受具足無遮法，若來者畏傷梵行。
translated: The bhikṣuṇī Dharmapālā, for the disciple named so-and-so, has received full ordination. She has already received full ordination in the bhikṣuṇī saṅgha without any obstacles. If she comes, she fears it will harm her pure conduct.

original: 法預比丘尼為弟子某甲，已從僧乞使受具足。
analyzed: 法預比丘尼為弟子某甲，已從僧乞使受具足。
translated: The bhikṣuṇī Dharmapālā, for the disciple named so-and-so, has already requested the saṅgha to send her to receive full ordination.

original: 僧今羯磨某甲某甲比丘使為法預比丘尼弟子某甲受具足。
analyzed: 僧今羯磨某甲某甲比丘使為法預比丘尼弟子某甲受具足。
translated: The Saṅgha now performs the karman for so-and-so and so-and-so bhikṣus to act as the Dharma-preceptors for the bhikṣuṇī disciples so-and-so, in order to grant them full ordination.

original: 諸大德忍羯磨某甲、某甲比丘使為法預比丘尼弟子某甲受具足者默然，若不忍便說。
analyzed: 諸大德忍羯磨某甲、某甲比丘使為法預比丘尼弟子某甲受具足者默然，若不忍便說。
translated: If the Venerable Ones consent to the karman for so-and-so and so-and-so bhikṣus to act as the Dharma-preceptors for the bhikṣuṇī disciples so-and-so, in order to grant them full ordination, they should remain silent. If they do not consent, they should speak.
This is the first karman.
The second and third are also said in the same way.

original: 「僧已羯磨某甲某、甲比丘使為法預比丘尼弟子某甲受具足竟，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
analyzed: 「僧已羯磨某甲某、甲比丘使為法預比丘尼弟子某甲受具足竟，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
translated: The Saṅgha has finished performing the karman for so-and-so and so-and-so bhikṣus to act as the Dharma-preceptors for the bhikṣuṇī disciples so-and-so, in order to grant them full ordination. The Saṅgha consents because of its silence. This matter is thus settled.

original: 」是比丘受羯磨竟，即應往比丘尼精舍。
analyzed: 」是比丘受羯磨竟，即應往比丘尼精舍。
translated: After the bhikṣus have received the karman, they should go to the bhikṣuṇīs' dwelling place.

original: 受具足人應向使乞，䠒跪合掌作如是言：
analyzed: 受具足人應向使乞，䠒跪合掌作如是言：
translated: The person who is to receive full ordination should request it from the Dharma-preceptors, kneeling with palms joined, and say:
Venerable Saṅgha, please recall!

original: 我某甲從和上尼某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中受具足，清淨無遮法。
analyzed: 我某甲從和上尼某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中受具足，清淨無遮法。
translated: I, so-and-so, have received full ordination from my preceptor bhikṣuṇī so-and-so. I have already received full ordination in the bhikṣuṇīs' saṅgha, and I am pure, with no obstructing factors.

original: 我若出此間者畏傷梵行，此間住。
analyzed: 我若出此間者畏傷梵行，此間住。
translated: If I leave this place, I fear it will harm the practice of celibacy, so I stay here.

original: 我某甲，和上尼某甲，今從僧乞受具足，唯願僧哀愍故，與我受具足。
analyzed: 我某甲，和上尼某甲，今從僧乞受具足，唯願僧哀愍故，與我受具足。
translated: I, so-and-so, with Venerable Nun so-and-so as preceptor, now request full ordination from the Sangha. May the Sangha out of compassion grant me full ordination.
In this way, up to three times.

original: 和上尼應共使到僧中，和上尼應乞，䠒跪合掌作如是言：
analyzed: 和上尼應共使到僧中，和上尼應乞，䠒跪合掌作如是言：
translated: The preceptor nun should go to the Sangha together with her, and the preceptor nun should request, kneeling with palms joined, saying:
Venerable Sangha, please be mindful!

original: 我法預比丘尼，弟子某甲欲受具足，已比丘尼眾中受具足，清淨無遮法，若來者畏傷梵行，彼間住。
analyzed: 我法預比丘尼，弟子某甲欲受具足，已比丘尼眾中受具足，清淨無遮法，若來者畏傷梵行，彼間住。
translated: My disciple so-and-so, a probationer nun, wishes to receive full ordination. She has already received full ordination in the assembly of nuns. She is pure and has no obstacles. If she comes, she fears it will harm the practice of celibacy, so she stays there.

original: 我法預弟子某甲今從僧乞受具足，唯願僧哀愍故與受具足。
analyzed: 我法預弟子某甲今從僧乞受具足，唯願僧哀愍故與受具足。
translated: My disciple so-and-so, a probationer nun, now requests full ordination from the Sangha. May the Sangha out of compassion grant her full ordination.
In this way, up to three requests.
The karma master should say:
Venerable Sangha, please listen!

original: 某甲從某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中受具足，清淨無遮法，若來者畏傷梵行，彼間住。
analyzed: 某甲從某甲受具足，已比丘尼眾中受具足，清淨無遮法，若來者畏傷梵行，彼間住。
translated: I, so-and-so, have received the full ordination from so-and-so. I have received the full ordination in the assembly of bhikṣuṇīs. I am pure and free from obstacles. If I were to come, I would fear harming the pure conduct. I will stay there.

original: 和上尼某甲已從僧乞受具足。
analyzed: 和上尼某甲已從僧乞受具足。
translated: The preceptor bhikṣuṇī so-and-so has already requested the Saṃgha to give the full ordination.

original: 若僧時到，僧與某甲受具足，和上尼某甲。
analyzed: 若僧時到，僧與某甲受具足，和上尼某甲。
translated: If the Saṃgha's time is right, the Saṃgha will give the full ordination to so-and-so, with the preceptor bhikṣuṇī so-and-so.
The announcement is as follows.

original: 」一白三羯磨已，和上尼共使還至比丘尼精舍，作如是言：
analyzed: 」一白三羯磨已，和上尼共使還至比丘尼精舍，作如是言：
translated: After the first announcement and three karman procedures, the preceptor bhikṣuṇī and the messenger return to the bhikṣuṇīs' dwelling place and say this:
Good women, listen!

original: 汝已受具足，一白三羯磨、無遮法、十眾以上、和合二部眾。
analyzed: 汝已受具足，一白三羯磨、無遮法、十眾以上、和合二部眾。
translated: You have now received the full ordination, with one announcement and three karman procedures, free from obstacles, with a group of ten or more, in harmony with the two groups.

original: 受具足竟，汝應恭敬三寶，汝已遭遇，人身難得、佛世難值、聞法亦難。
analyzed: 受具足竟，汝應恭敬三寶，汝已遭遇，人身難得、佛世難值、聞法亦難。
translated: After receiving the full ordination, you should respectfully serve the Three Jewels. You have now encountered what is difficult to obtain - a human body, the Buddha's world, and hearing the Dharma is also difficult.

original: 」是名二歲學戒二部眾中受具足。
analyzed: 」是名二歲學戒二部眾中受具足。
translated: This is called receiving the full ordination in the assembly of the two groups with two years of training precepts.
This is called the second respectful Dharma.

original: 說罪者，比丘尼不得說比丘實罪、非實罪。
analyzed: 說罪者，比丘尼不得說比丘實罪、非實罪。
translated: As for confessing offenses, a bhikṣuṇī cannot confess the real or unreal offenses of a bhikṣu.

original: 比丘得說尼實罪，不得說非實罪。
analyzed: 比丘得說尼實罪，不得說非實罪。
translated: A bhikṣu can confess the real offenses of a bhikṣuṇī, but cannot confess her unreal offenses.

original: 尼不得說言醫師比丘、犯戒比丘、摩訶羅比丘，若親里者得軟語諫，不得呵責。
analyzed: 尼不得說言醫師比丘、犯戒比丘、摩訶羅比丘，若親里者得軟語諫，不得呵責。
translated: A bhikṣuṇī cannot say, The bhikṣu is a doctor, The bhikṣu has broken the precepts, or The bhikṣu is a fool. If she is a relative, she may admonish with soft words, but cannot rebuke him.
If he is young, she should say:
You are not learning now, waiting until old age to learn?

original: 汝後當教詔弟子，汝不學者，後弟子亦當學汝作惡，是故汝應隨順學，受經、誦經。
analyzed: 汝後當教詔弟子，汝不學者，後弟子亦當學汝作惡，是故汝應隨順學，受經、誦經。
translated: Later you will be teaching disciples, if you do not learn, your disciples will also learn from you to do evil. Therefore you should learn in accordance, receive the sūtras, and recite the sūtras.

original: 」若比丘尼說比丘過，言醫師比丘、犯戒比丘、摩訶羅比丘者，越敬法。
analyzed: 」若比丘尼說比丘過，言醫師比丘、犯戒比丘、摩訶羅比丘者，越敬法。
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī speaks of a bhikṣu's faults, saying, The bhikṣu is a doctor, The bhikṣu has broken the precepts, or The bhikṣu is a fool, she commits an offense of disrespect.

original: 比丘得說比丘尼實過，不得呵責言剃髮老嫗、婬蕩老嫗、摩訶梨老嫗。
analyzed: 比丘得說比丘尼實過，不得呵責言剃髮老嫗、婬蕩老嫗、摩訶梨老嫗。
translated: A bhikṣu can speak of the real faults of a bhikṣuṇī, but cannot rebuke her, saying, The shaven-headed old woman, The licentious old woman, or The old woman of Mahā.

original: 若是親里作非法者，得語言：
analyzed: 若是親里作非法者，得語言：
translated: If a relative is acting improperly, one may say to them:
Do not do this.
One should not scold or berate them, but should gently admonish them.
If they are young, one should say:
You are not learning now, waiting until old age to learn?

original: 汝後當教詔弟子，汝不學者，後弟子亦當學汝作惡，是故當受經、誦經。
analyzed: 汝後當教詔弟子，汝不學者，後弟子亦當學汝作惡，是故當受經、誦經。
translated: Later you will be teaching disciples, if you do not learn now, later your disciples will also learn from you to do evil. Therefore, you should receive and recite the sutras.
If a monk scolds a nun, saying:

original: 「剃髮老嫗、婬蕩老嫗、摩訶梨，不善不識恩養。
analyzed: 「剃髮老嫗、婬蕩老嫗、摩訶梨，不善不識恩養。
translated: Shaven old crone, licentious old crone, Mahā-r, unskillful and ungrateful,
it is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: 是名比丘尼不得說比丘實罪非實罪，比丘得說比丘尼實罪。
analyzed: 是名比丘尼不得說比丘實罪非實罪，比丘得說比丘尼實罪。
translated: This is called a nun not being allowed to speak the true faults of a monk, while a monk is allowed to speak the true faults of a nun.
This is called the third respectful rule.

original: 不先受者，比丘尼不先比丘受食、房舍、床褥。
analyzed: 不先受者，比丘尼不先比丘受食、房舍、床褥。
translated: Not to receive first means a nun does not receive food, dwelling places, or bedding before a monk.

original: 若有人請比丘尼食者，應語：
analyzed: 若有人請比丘尼食者，應語：
translated: If someone invites a bhikṣuṇī to a meal, she should say:
First invite the most venerable assembly.
If they say:

original: 「我於彼無敬心，正欲請諸比丘尼。
analyzed: 「我於彼無敬心，正欲請諸比丘尼。
translated: We have no respect for them, we just want to invite the bhikṣuṇīs.
Then she should say:
We also do not accept.
If they say:

original: 「我先已曾請僧前食、後食，已曾共人請，未曾請諸尼。
analyzed: 「我先已曾請僧前食、後食，已曾共人請，未曾請諸尼。
translated: We have already invited the monks to meals before and after, we have already invited together, but we have never invited the bhikṣuṇīs.
If so, she should accept.

original: 下至先與僧一摶食者，比丘尼後得種種好食無罪。
analyzed: 下至先與僧一摶食者，比丘尼後得種種好食無罪。
translated: Even if they have previously given the Saṅgha a single lump of food, the bhikṣuṇī can later obtain various good foods without fault.
If someone comes and says:
I want to build a dwelling for the bhikṣuṇīs.
She should say:
First build for the most venerable assembly.
If they say:
We have no respect for them, we just want to build for the bhikṣuṇīs.
She should say:
We also do not accept.
If they say:

original: 「我先已曾與僧作房舍、講堂、溫室、食堂、門屋、井屋、廁屋、洗脚處屋，曾共眾人作，未曾為尼作。
analyzed: 「我先已曾與僧作房舍、講堂、溫室、食堂、門屋、井屋、廁屋、洗脚處屋，曾共眾人作，未曾為尼作。
translated: I have already given to the Sangha before houses, lecture halls, warm rooms, dining halls, gatehouses, wellhouses, toilet houses, foot-washing houses, but I have never given to the nuns.
If so, you should accept.

original: 下至先與僧一蚊厨，後比丘尼受大房無罪。
analyzed: 下至先與僧一蚊厨，後比丘尼受大房無罪。
translated: At the very least, if you have previously given to the Sangha even a mosquito-sized house, the nuns can later accept a large house without offense.

original: 若有人來與比丘尼床褥者，應語：
analyzed: 若有人來與比丘尼床褥者，應語：
translated: If someone comes to give bedding to the nuns, they should say:
Give it to the superior Sangha first.
If they say:
I have no respect for them.
They should say:
We also will not accept.
If they say:

original: 「我先已曾與比丘僧床褥、枕俱、執臥具，未曾與尼。
analyzed: 「我先已曾與比丘僧床褥、枕俱、執臥具，未曾與尼。
translated: I have already given bedding, pillows, and sleeping mats to the monks before, but never to the nuns.
If so, they can accept it.

original: 下至先與比丘僧一小床，比丘尼後受好床褥無罪。
analyzed: 下至先與比丘僧一小床，比丘尼後受好床褥無罪。
translated: At the very least, if they have previously given even a small bed to the monks, the nuns can later accept a good bed and bedding without offense.

original: 若檀越未曾飯僧施床褥，比丘尼先受者，越敬法。
analyzed: 若檀越未曾飯僧施床褥，比丘尼先受者，越敬法。
translated: If a patron has never fed the Sangha before and offers bedding, if a bhikṣuṇī accepts it first, it is a transgression against the respectful Dharma.

original: 是名比丘尼不先受食床褥。
analyzed: 是名比丘尼不先受食床褥。
translated: This is called a bhikṣuṇī not accepting food and bedding first.
The fourth respectful Dharma is finished.

original: 半月摩那埵者，若比丘尼越敬法，應二部眾中半月行摩那埵。
analyzed: 半月摩那埵者，若比丘尼越敬法，應二部眾中半月行摩那埵。
translated: As for the fortnight of mānatva, if a bhikṣuṇī transgresses the respectful Dharma, she should practice mānatva for a fortnight in the assembly of both [orders].

original: 若犯十九僧伽婆尸沙，應二部眾中半月行摩那埵，比丘尼眾中行隨順法，應日日白二部僧，是名二部僧。
analyzed: 若犯十九僧伽婆尸沙，應二部眾中半月行摩那埵，比丘尼眾中行隨順法，應日日白二部僧，是名二部僧。
translated: If she commits nineteen saṃghāvaśeṣas, she should practice mānatva for a fortnight in the assembly of both [orders], practice the dharma of obedience in the assembly of bhikṣuṇīs, and should inform the assembly of both [orders] daily. This is called the assembly of both [orders].

original: 是名比丘尼二部眾中半月行摩那埵。
analyzed: 是名比丘尼二部眾中半月行摩那埵。
translated: This is called a bhikṣuṇī practicing mānatva for a fortnight in the assembly of both [orders].
The fifth respectful Dharma is finished.

original: 半月問布薩求教誡者，比丘尼至布薩日，若一切尼僧、若遣使至比丘精舍禮塔已，至知識比丘所，與清淨欲，作如是言：
analyzed: 半月問布薩求教誡者，比丘尼至布薩日，若一切尼僧、若遣使至比丘精舍禮塔已，至知識比丘所，與清淨欲，作如是言：
translated: As for asking about the poṣadha and seeking instruction every half month, on the poṣadha day, the bhikṣuṇīs, whether the entire assembly of bhikṣuṇīs or sending a messenger, should go to the bhikṣus' vihāra, pay homage to the stūpa, and go to the bhikṣus who are their acquaintances. They should give their pure karman and say like this:

original: 「一切比丘尼僧和合禮比丘僧足，問布薩請教誡。
analyzed: 「一切比丘尼僧和合禮比丘僧足，問布薩請教誡。
translated: The entire assembly of bhikṣuṇīs, in unity, bow at the feet of the bhikṣu saṅgha and ask about the poṣadha and request instruction.
In this way, say it three times.

original: 僧布薩時，誦戒比丘應作是說：
analyzed: 僧布薩時，誦戒比丘應作是說：
translated: When the bhikṣu saṅgha is performing the poṣadha, the bhikṣu who recites the precepts should say:
Venerable bhikṣu saṅgha, please listen!

original: 今布薩爾所日已過，餘爾所日在，佛聲聞僧常所行事，諸大德不來，諸比丘說欲清淨，誰與比丘尼取欲？
analyzed: 今布薩爾所日已過，餘爾所日在，佛聲聞僧常所行事，諸大德不來，諸比丘說欲清淨，誰與比丘尼取欲？
translated: Today is the poṣadha on such-and-such date. So many days have passed, and so many remain. This is a regular practice of the bhikṣu saṅgha of the Buddha's śrāvakas. Venerable ones who are not present, the bhikṣus have declared their purity and given their consent. Who will receive the consent of the bhikṣuṇīs?

original: 」取尼欲人應至上座前，偏袒右肩合掌作如是言：
analyzed: 」取尼欲人應至上座前，偏袒右肩合掌作如是言：
translated: The person who receives the consent of the bhikṣuṇīs should go before the most senior bhikṣu, bare his right shoulder, place his palms together, and say:

original: 「比丘尼僧和合禮比丘僧足，與清淨欲，問布薩請教誡。
analyzed: 「比丘尼僧和合禮比丘僧足，與清淨欲，問布薩請教誡。
translated: The entire assembly of bhikṣuṇīs, in unity, bow at the feet of the bhikṣu saṅgha and give their consent and purity. They ask about the poṣadha and request instruction.
In this way, say it three times.
The reciter of the precepts should ask:
Who will instruct the bhikṣuṇīs?
If there is already a person who instructs the bhikṣuṇīs, the reciter should ask:
On what date will the bhikṣuṇīs come?
Where will the instruction be given?
The senior person should say:
Come on such-and-such day to such-and-such place.

original: 」若無教誡人者，先取尼清淨欲。
analyzed: 」若無教誡人者，先取尼清淨欲。
translated: If there is no instructor, first take the nuns' pure precepts.
The monk should say to the nuns:
Sisters!

original: 無有教誡人，當謹慎莫放逸。
analyzed: 無有教誡人，當謹慎莫放逸。
translated: There is no instructor, you should be careful and not be negligent.

original: 」若比丘成就十二法，僧應羯磨作教誡人。
analyzed: 」若比丘成就十二法，僧應羯磨作教誡人。
translated: If a monk accomplishes twelve dharmas, the Saṃgha should perform a karman to make him an instructor.
What are the twelve?
First, upholding the precepts;
Second, being learned and not forgetting;
Third, upholding the extensive and concise Vinaya;
Fourth, being eloquent and able to speak;
Fifth, studying the precepts;
Sixth, studying concentration;
Seventh, studying wisdom;
Eighth, being able to eliminate evil views;
Ninth, having pure practice;
Tenth, not defiling the pure conduct of nuns;
Eleventh, being patient;
Twelfth, being twenty years old or older.
These are called accomplishing the twelve dharmas.

original: 僧應拜作教誡比丘尼人。
analyzed: 僧應拜作教誡比丘尼人。
translated: The Saṃgha should appoint him as the monk who instructs the nuns.
The one who performs the karman should say:
Venerable Sangha, listen!
Bhikṣu so-and-so has accomplished the twelve dharmas.

original: 若僧時到，僧拜某甲比丘教誡比丘尼。
analyzed: 若僧時到，僧拜某甲比丘教誡比丘尼。
translated: If the Sangha has arrived at the time, the Sangha appoints bhikṣu so-and-so to instruct the bhikṣuṇīs.
The announcement is like this.
Venerable Sangha, listen!

original: 某甲比丘十二法成就，僧今拜某甲比丘教誡比丘尼。
analyzed: 某甲比丘十二法成就，僧今拜某甲比丘教誡比丘尼。
translated: Bhikṣu so-and-so has accomplished the twelve dharmas. The Sangha now appoints bhikṣu so-and-so to instruct the bhikṣuṇīs.

original: 諸大德忍拜某比丘教誡比丘尼者默然，若不忍者便說。
analyzed: 諸大德忍拜某比丘教誡比丘尼者默然，若不忍者便說。
translated: If the Venerable Ones agree to appoint bhikṣu so-and-so to instruct the bhikṣuṇīs, they should remain silent. If they do not agree, they should speak.
This is the first karman.
The second and third are also said in the same way.

original: 「僧已拜某比丘作教誡尼人竟，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
analyzed: 「僧已拜某比丘作教誡尼人竟，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
translated: The Sangha has already completed the appointment of bhikṣu so-and-so as the instructor of the bhikṣuṇīs. The Sangha agrees and remains silent. This matter is thus upheld.

original: 」是比丘受羯磨已，應教誡比丘尼。
analyzed: 」是比丘受羯磨已，應教誡比丘尼。
translated: After this bhikṣu has received the karman, he should instruct the bhikṣuṇīs.
The method of instruction has eight points.
What are the eight?
First, not at the right time;
Second, not at the right place;
Third, past the time;
Fourth, before the time has come;
Fifth, not in harmony;
Sixth, retinue;
Seventh, long-phrase teaching;
Eighth, welcoming instruction.

original: 非時者，從日沒至明相未出教誡，是名非時。
analyzed: 非時者，從日沒至明相未出教誡，是名非時。
translated: Non-time means instructing from sunset until dawn, this is called non-time.

original: 若比丘非時教誡比丘尼者，波逸提。
analyzed: 若比丘非時教誡比丘尼者，波逸提。
translated: If a bhikṣu instructs bhikṣuṇīs at non-time, it is a pāyattika offense.

original: 非處者，不得深猥處、不得露現處，當在不深不露處，若講堂、若樹下。
analyzed: 非處者，不得深猥處、不得露現處，當在不深不露處，若講堂、若樹下。
translated: Non-place means not in a deep and secluded place, not in an exposed place, but in a place that is neither too deep nor too exposed, either in a lecture hall or under a tree.

original: 若比丘非處教誡比丘尼，越毘尼罪，是名非處。
analyzed: 若比丘非處教誡比丘尼，越毘尼罪，是名非處。
translated: If a bhikṣu instructs bhikṣuṇīs in a non-place, it is a saṃsthāgārika offense. This is called non-place.

original: 過時者，十四日、十五日是名過時。
analyzed: 過時者，十四日、十五日是名過時。
translated: Past the time means the fourteenth and fifteenth days are called past the time.

original: 時未至者，月一日、若二日、三日，是名時未至。
analyzed: 時未至者，月一日、若二日、三日，是名時未至。
translated: Before the time has come means the first, second, or third day of the month, this is called before the time has come.

original: 應從四日至十三日往教誡。
analyzed: 應從四日至十三日往教誡。
translated: One should go to instruct from the fourth day to the thirteenth day.

original: 時未至教誡比丘尼者，越毘尼罪，是名時未至。
analyzed: 時未至教誡比丘尼者，越毘尼罪，是名時未至。
translated: If the time has not yet come to instruct the bhikṣuṇīs, it is an offense of wrong conduct. This is called the time has not yet come.

original: 不和合者，比丘尼僧不和合不應教誡，和合已然後教誡。
analyzed: 不和合者，比丘尼僧不和合不應教誡，和合已然後教誡。
translated: Not in harmony means that if the bhikṣuṇī saṃgha is not in harmony, they should not instruct. Only after they are in harmony should they instruct.
After the instructor arrives, he should ask:
Is the bhikṣuṇī saṃgha in harmony?
If they say:
In harmony,
he should send a messenger to call out:
The bhikṣuṇīs come to listen to the instruction.

original: 若老病、服藥、作衣鉢事不得來者，應與欲。
analyzed: 若老病、服藥、作衣鉢事不得來者，應與欲。
translated: If the elderly, sick, those taking medicine, or those making robes and almsbowls are unable to come, they should give their consent.
Saying like this:
I, so-and-so, give my consent to the instruction.
Say this three times.

original: 若比丘尼僧不和合教誡者，越毘尼罪，是名不和合。
analyzed: 若比丘尼僧不和合教誡者，越毘尼罪，是名不和合。
translated: If the bhikṣuṇī saṃgha instructs without being in harmony, it is an offense of wrong conduct. This is called not in harmony.

original: 眷屬者，不得偏教誡，應一切尼僧和合已然後教誡，是名眷屬。
analyzed: 眷屬者，不得偏教誡，應一切尼僧和合已然後教誡，是名眷屬。
translated: Family means that one should not instruct in a biased manner. The entire bhikṣuṇī saṃgha should be in harmony before instructing. This is called family.

original: 長語說者，如尊者難陀長語教誡尼，應作是說：
analyzed: 長語說者，如尊者難陀長語教誡尼，應作是說：
translated: As for speaking at length, it is like Venerable Nanda instructing the nuns at length, who should say:
Do not do any evil, practice all that is wholesome;
purify one's own mind - this is the teaching of the Buddhas.
Sisters!

original: 此是教誡，欲聽者便聽，去者任意。
analyzed: 此是教誡，欲聽者便聽，去者任意。
translated: This is the instruction, if you wish to listen then listen, if you wish to leave then do as you please.

original: 」若比丘長語教誡比丘尼者，越毘尼罪，是名長語說法。
analyzed: 」若比丘長語教誡比丘尼者，越毘尼罪，是名長語說法。
translated: If a monk instructs the nuns at length, he commits an offense of wrong conduct. This is called speaking the Dharma at length.

original: 迎教誡人法者，若比丘尼城邑聚落住，聞教誡比丘某日來，若無供給人者，應倩諸年少比丘齎持華香幡蓋往迎。
analyzed: 迎教誡人法者，若比丘尼城邑聚落住，聞教誡比丘某日來，若無供給人者，應倩諸年少比丘齎持華香幡蓋往迎。
translated: As for the method of welcoming the instructor, if the nuns are staying in a city or village and hear that a certain monk instructor will be coming on a certain day, if there is no one to provide service, they should ask the younger monks to carry flowers, incense, banners, and canopies to welcome him.

original: 若無者，隨其多少，下至合掌設敬代擔衣鉢，若一由延、半由延、若一拘盧舍、半拘盧舍，下至出城邑聚落外迎。
analyzed: 若無者，隨其多少，下至合掌設敬代擔衣鉢，若一由延、半由延、若一拘盧舍、半拘盧舍，下至出城邑聚落外迎。
translated: If there is no one, according to their number, they should at least join palms in respect and carry his robes and bowl for him, whether it be one yojana, half a yojana, one krośa, half a krośa, or at least come out of the city or village to welcome him.
If one does not go out to greet them, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: 來已應勸化作前食、後食、非時漿，盡心供養，及眷屬七日勿令有乏。
analyzed: 來已應勸化作前食、後食、非時漿，盡心供養，及眷屬七日勿令有乏。
translated: Having come, one should encourage them to make food before meals, after meals, and non-time drinks, and make offerings with all one's heart, and for seven days one should not let them lack anything.

original: 若無者，出己衣鉢中餘持用供養。
analyzed: 若無者，出己衣鉢中餘持用供養。
translated: If one does not have [anything to offer], one should use one's own robes and alms bowl to make offerings.

original: 若復無者，下至合掌恭敬。
analyzed: 若復無者，下至合掌恭敬。
translated: If one still does not have [anything to offer], one should at least respectfully join one's palms.

original: 教誡尼法者，若阿毘曇、若毘尼。
analyzed: 教誡尼法者，若阿毘曇、若毘尼。
translated: The method of instructing nuns is either the Abhidharma or the Vinaya.
The Abhidharma is the nine divisions of sutras.

original: 毘尼者，波羅提木叉廣略。
analyzed: 毘尼者，波羅提木叉廣略。
translated: The Vinaya is the extensive and concise Prātimokṣa.

original: 教誡人若尼來時，不得低頭而住，應觀相威儀。
analyzed: 教誡人若尼來時，不得低頭而住，應觀相威儀。
translated: When a person instructing [nuns] or a nun comes, one should not lower one's head and remain [silent], but should observe their appearance and deportment.

original: 若見油澤塗頭、莊眼、著上色衣擣令光澤、白帶繫腰，如是者應呵。
analyzed: 若見油澤塗頭、莊眼、著上色衣擣令光澤、白帶繫腰，如是者應呵。
translated: If one sees that they have anointed their head with oil, adorned their eyes, worn brightly colored robes that have been polished to a shine, and tied a white sash around their waist, one should rebuke them.
If they are young, one should say:
Sisters!

original: 汝今年少不學，待老當學耶？
analyzed: 汝今年少不學，待老當學耶？
translated: You are young now and not studying. Are you waiting to study when you are old?

original: 汝後當教詔弟子，汝不學者，弟子亦當學汝作惡，是故汝應隨順學受經、誦經。
analyzed: 汝後當教詔弟子，汝不學者，弟子亦當學汝作惡，是故汝應隨順學受經、誦經。
translated: You should later instruct your disciples. If you do not learn, your disciples will also learn from you to do evil. Therefore, you should follow and learn to accept and recite the sutras.

original: 」若有俗人者不得教，勿令前人起不善心，言：
analyzed: 」若有俗人者不得教，勿令前人起不善心，言：
translated: If there are laypeople, they should not be taught, lest the person in front give rise to an unwholesome mind and say:
The śramaṇa instructs his wife.
If so, they should not be taught. They should ask other nuns:
Whose companion disciple is this?
Whose dependent disciple is this?

original: 」問已，應語彼和上、阿闍梨教呵，令隨順行法，勿令作非威儀事。
analyzed: 」問已，應語彼和上、阿闍梨教呵，令隨順行法，勿令作非威儀事。
translated: After asking, they should tell the preceptor and teacher to instruct and reprimand them to follow the Dharma and not engage in improper conduct.

original: 比丘教誡比丘尼時應如女想，比丘尼於教誡人如佛想，是名半月問布薩求教誡。
analyzed: 比丘教誡比丘尼時應如女想，比丘尼於教誡人如佛想，是名半月問布薩求教誡。
translated: When a bhikṣu instructs a bhikṣuṇī, he should think of her as a daughter. The bhikṣuṇī should think of the instructor as the Buddha. This is called asking about the poṣadha every half month and seeking instruction.
The sixth respectful rule is finished.

original: 不依比丘不得住安居者，若親里欲請比丘尼安居者，尼應語檀越：
analyzed: 不依比丘不得住安居者，若親里欲請比丘尼安居者，尼應語檀越：
translated: As for not being allowed to stay for the summer retreat without relying on a bhikṣu, if a relative wants to invite a bhikṣuṇī to stay for the summer retreat, the bhikṣuṇī should tell the donor:
First invite the most senior one.
If they say:
We have no respect for them, we just want to invite nuns.
The nuns should say:
We will not go either.

original: 」若為親里欲去者，應自請比丘，到彼已應料理前食、後食、非時漿、安居衣，勿令有乏。
analyzed: 」若為親里欲去者，應自請比丘，到彼已應料理前食、後食、非時漿、安居衣，勿令有乏。
translated: If they want to go for the sake of relatives, they should themselves invite monks. Having arrived there, they should prepare meals before and after, non-mealtime drinks, and retreat robes, not letting them lack anything.

original: 若親里不與者，當自出己衣鉢中餘供給。
analyzed: 若親里不與者，當自出己衣鉢中餘供給。
translated: If the relatives do not provide, they should themselves use their own robes and alms bowls to provide for them.

original: 若安居中比丘若死、若罷道、若餘處去，尼不得去。
analyzed: 若安居中比丘若死、若罷道、若餘處去，尼不得去。
translated: If during the retreat a monk dies, renounces the path, or goes elsewhere, the nuns should not leave.

original: 三由延內有僧伽藍者，應通結界，半月應往問布薩。
analyzed: 三由延內有僧伽藍者，應通結界，半月應往問布薩。
translated: If there is a monastery within three yojanas, they should establish a common boundary, and every half month they should go to ask about the poṣadha.

original: 若道路賊難、恐怖畏奪命傷梵行，有此等諸難者，至後安居末應往自恣。
analyzed: 若道路賊難、恐怖畏奪命傷梵行，有此等諸難者，至後安居末應往自恣。
translated: If on the road there are dangers of thieves, fear of losing their lives, or harm to their pure conduct, if there are such difficulties, they should go to the end of the latter retreat to go to the pravarana.

original: 若故有眾難者，當語親里：
analyzed: 若故有眾難者，當語親里：
translated: If there are still many difficulties, they should tell their relatives:
Please invite the bhikṣus to come.

original: 」來已供給所須前食、後食及非時漿，勿令有乏，自恣已應還本處。
analyzed: 」來已供給所須前食、後食及非時漿，勿令有乏，自恣已應還本處。
translated: After they come, provide them with necessary things such as pre-meal, post-meal, and non-meal drinks, and do not let them lack anything. After the retreat, you should return to your original place.

original: 若比丘尼欲住安居處，無比丘不得住安居。
analyzed: 若比丘尼欲住安居處，無比丘不得住安居。
translated: If a bhikṣuṇī wishes to stay in a place for the retreat, she cannot stay there for the retreat if there are no bhikṣus.

original: 若住安居者，越敬法，是名無比丘住處，比丘尼不得安居。
analyzed: 若住安居者，越敬法，是名無比丘住處，比丘尼不得安居。
translated: If she stays for the retreat, she violates the respectful Dharma. This is called a place where there are no bhikṣus, and a bhikṣuṇī cannot stay there for the retreat.
The seventh respectful Dharma is concluded.

original: 比丘尼安居竟二部僧中受自恣者，比丘尼至自恣日受自恣已，明日清旦應一切往比丘僧所受自恣。
analyzed: 比丘尼安居竟二部僧中受自恣者，比丘尼至自恣日受自恣已，明日清旦應一切往比丘僧所受自恣。
translated: As for the bhikṣuṇīs who have completed the retreat and receive the invitation to confess in the saṃgha of the two orders, the bhikṣuṇīs should receive the invitation to confess on the day of the invitation to confess. The next day at dawn, they should all go to the bhikṣus' saṃgha to receive the invitation to confess.

original: 尼僧中應羯磨一尼能受自恣者。
analyzed: 尼僧中應羯磨一尼能受自恣者。
translated: In the bhikṣuṇīs' saṃgha, they should perform the karman to appoint a bhikṣuṇī who can receive the invitation to confess.
The person performing the karman should say:
The bhikṣuṇīs' saṃgha should listen!

original: 某甲比丘尼能為尼僧作自恣人，若僧時到，僧羯磨某甲比丘尼為尼僧作自恣人。
analyzed: 某甲比丘尼能為尼僧作自恣人，若僧時到，僧羯磨某甲比丘尼為尼僧作自恣人。
translated: Bhikṣuṇī So-and-so is able to act as the self-confessor for the bhikṣuṇī saṃgha. If the saṃgha's time has come, the saṃgha will perform the karman to have Bhikṣuṇī So-and-so act as the self-confessor for the bhikṣuṇī saṃgha.

original: 諸尼僧聽某甲比丘尼為尼僧作自恣人，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
analyzed: 諸尼僧聽某甲比丘尼為尼僧作自恣人，僧忍默然故，是事如是持。
translated: The bhikṣuṇī saṃgha listens. Bhikṣuṇī So-and-so will act as the self-confessor for the bhikṣuṇī saṃgha. The saṃgha approves and is silent. This matter is thus upheld.

original: 」比丘、尼僧二眾各和合者，應作是說：
analyzed: 」比丘、尼僧二眾各和合者，應作是說：
translated: If the bhikṣu and bhikṣuṇī saṃghas are each in harmony, they should say this:

original: 「比丘、尼僧和合，比丘僧和合自恣說，若見聞疑罪，僧當語我，哀愍故。
analyzed: 「比丘、尼僧和合，比丘僧和合自恣說，若見聞疑罪，僧當語我，哀愍故。
translated: The bhikṣu and bhikṣuṇī saṃghas are in harmony. The bhikṣu saṃgha is in harmony and confesses its own purity. If there are offenses seen, heard, or suspected, the saṃgha should speak to me out of compassion.
If there are offenses seen, heard, or suspected, they should be eliminated according to the Dharma.

original: 」第二、第三亦如是說。🔽若比丘僧和合、眾多比丘尼者，應作是說：
analyzed: 」第二、第三亦如是說。 若比丘僧和合、眾多比丘尼者，應作是說：
translated: The second and third [recitations] are also said in the same way.🔽If the bhikṣu saṃgha is in harmony but there are many bhikṣuṇīs, they should say this:

original: 「眾多比丘尼、比丘僧和合自恣說，若見聞疑罪，僧當語。
analyzed: 「眾多比丘尼、比丘僧和合自恣說，若見聞疑罪，僧當語。
translated: The many bhikṣuṇīs and the bhikṣu saṃgha are in harmony and confess their own purity. If there are offenses seen, heard, or suspected, the saṃgha should speak.

original: 我哀愍故，若知若見，當如法除。
analyzed: 我哀愍故，若知若見，當如法除。
translated: Out of compassion for me, if you know or see, you should remove it according to the Dharma.
Speak like this a second and a third time.

original: 若比丘僧和合、一比丘尼者，應作是說：
analyzed: 若比丘僧和合、一比丘尼者，應作是說：
translated: If the Saṅgha of monks is in harmony and there is one nun, she should say:

original: 「我比丘尼、比丘僧和合自恣說，若見聞疑罪，僧當語我，哀愍故，若知若見，當如法除。
analyzed: 「我比丘尼、比丘僧和合自恣說，若見聞疑罪，僧當語我，哀愍故，若知若見，當如法除。
translated: I, a nun, speak to the Saṅgha of monks in harmony during the invitation ceremony, if you see, hear, or suspect any offenses, the Saṅgha should speak to me out of compassion, if you know or see, you should remove it according to the Dharma.
Speak like this a second and a third time.

original: 若眾多比丘、比丘尼僧和合者，應作是說：
analyzed: 若眾多比丘、比丘尼僧和合者，應作是說：
translated: If the Saṅgha of many monks and nuns is in harmony, they should say:

original: 「比丘尼僧和合，諸大德自恣說，若見聞疑罪，諸大德當語我，哀愍故，若知若見，當如法除。
analyzed: 「比丘尼僧和合，諸大德自恣說，若見聞疑罪，諸大德當語我，哀愍故，若知若見，當如法除。
translated: The Saṅgha of nuns is in harmony, all Venerables speak during the invitation ceremony, if you see, hear, or suspect any offenses, all Venerables should speak to me out of compassion, if you know or see, you should remove it according to the Dharma.
Speak like this a second and a third time.

original: 若眾多比丘、眾多比丘尼者，應作是說：
analyzed: 若眾多比丘、眾多比丘尼者，應作是說：
translated: If there are many monks and many nuns, they should say:
Many bhikṣus, bhikṣuṇīs, and other noble ones confess their faults.
Up to the second and third times, it is said in the same way.

original: 一比丘乃至一比丘尼者，應作是說：
